root.name: shininess()
root.description: Sets the amount of gloss in the surface of shapes. Used in combination with ambient, specular(), and emissive() in setting the materal properties of shapes. The parameter shine ranges from 0.0 to 1.0 to set the shininess of the current material.

parameter.label: shine
parameter.description: float: degree of shininess from 0.0 and 1.0
